# Email Marketing For Adventure Travel

### _Sell Out Your Season_

Let us guide your email campaign so you can stay focused on serving your
guests. Book an appointment to find out how.

FREE CONSULTATION

## We help overwhelmed adventure travel business owners by handling their
email campaigns and selling out their seasons.

You already have a marketing advantage over most businesses. You sell life-
changing adventure travel and experiences—the stuff of daydreams—and you have
great stories to tell. But are you capitalizing on that edge?

We’re guessing no. The problem isn’t that you don’t have compelling things to
say, it’s that you don’t have the time, expertise, and tools to say them.  Our
email campaign management services can change that. It can bring your
inspiring stories to life and turn curious onlookers into raving trip-bookers.

FREE CONSULTATION

## You Love People and Adventure, Not Email

We’re willing to bet you started your business because you love people and
adventure, not because you wanted to master a tedious and technical online
medium like email marketing.

The cool thing is that while email marketing is too important to overlook, you
don’t have to figure it out yourself. That’s our job.

We’ve spent years working with companies just like yours—mostly because we
love the seize-the-day spirit… But also because we get results.

## Email Marketing For Adventure Travel Just Plain Works

In your business, the difference between a successful season and a mediocre
one can be just a few clients.

Email marketing for adventure travel is a proven way to increase bookings from
existing customers and expand your reach to new ones.

FREE CONSULTATION

## The Right Adventure Travel Email  
Campaign Can:

  * Capture interested prospects that browse your website
  * Properly introduce your offering in bite size chunks over time
  * Give readers a tantalizing taste of the adventure that awaits them
  * Promote your latest award, PR win, or 5-star review
  * Survey previous guests
  * Give your audience something to share with their fellow adventure-seekers

## Resulting In These Desired Outcomes:

  * A large, growing email list
  * Consistent effortless bookings
  * Educated buyers who are easier to serve
  * Increased online reviews and feedback from previous guests
  * An elevated and strengthened brand image
  * Referrals from readers forwarding messages to others
  * SELLING OUT YOUR SEASON IN ADVANCE

FREE CONSULTATION

## Hakai Lodge Sees A 37% Increase In Sales With Email Marketing

Hakai Lodge was struggling to book trips. After 30 years in business, their
old marketing techniques weren’t working, so they turned to Email Broadcast
for help. After a quick email audit and a new email campaign, almost
immediately, their bookings increased an astounding 37%. 2017 was their best
season ever. Then in 2018, they hosted over 300 guests during their brief
62-day season, smashing the previous record year and effectively selling out
their season.

Read more about Hakai Lodge’s success with email marketing.



## Alaska Alpine Sells Out Season Before It Begins

Thinking of booking a trip with Alaska Alpine Adventures, an award-winning
eco-tour company? You’ll have to think ahead a couple years! We help Alaska
Alpine Adventures use the power of email marketing, including automation, to
sell out season after season. Its welcome series is so successful that it sees
open rates of over 50% and click rates above 15%. And we look forward to doing
it again and again for them.

Read about Alaska Alpine’s email marketing success story.

## Blackfish Lodge Sells Out Their Season Before It Starts

As a small operation, Blackfish Lodge knows that a profitable season usually
comes down to a few extra guests. They hired Email Broadcast to help hook
those guests with automated emails. Now, when people sign up for the lodge’s
fishing reports, they get a three-email series about what it’s like to stay at
the lodge.

The first year the email series was active, they sold out their season before
it had even started **for the first time ever.** When we compared their
customer list with their automated series recipients, we found that 70% of
early bookers had received the tantalizing introductory messages.

FREE CONSULTATION

## Knik River Lodge Capitalizes on Opportunity for Growth

If you’re looking for an Alaskan adventure that offers world-class hospitality
and comfort, Knik River Lodge may be your dream come true. There’s a reason it
was awarded Tripadvisor’s Award of Excellence. With all the amazing press,
Knik still had an opportunity to grow its event hosting, especially weddings.
They turned to email marketing, leveraging a custom SuperCollector and
automated series, and started seeing incredible results—10% increase in email
sign-ups and 60% open rates on their welcome series.

Read about Knik’s email marketing strategy and success story.

## Yeah, But Will It Work With My Customers?

The decision to travel may seem spontaneous and simple, but we know it’s more
involved than that. Booking trips takes an immense amount of energy and
research. 60% of leisure travelers make their own travel arrangements—and they
look online to do it.

When they visit your website and find it interesting, what happens next? Are
you capturing their email addresses? Are you sending them targeted
messages—engaging them through the research process, telling your story,
generating interest, and providing real value so they won’t be able to resist
your call to “book now?” You will be with us. Book an appointment to find out
how easy this can be.

FREE CONSULTATION
